text: mn dha aladhi yunfiq fi sabil allah 'infaqana hsnana ahtsabana llajr, fayudaeifah lah 'adeafana kathiratan la tuhsaa min althawab wahusn aljza'? wallah yaqbid wybst, fa'anfiquu wala tbalu; fa'iinah hu alrzaq, yudyiq ealaa man yasha' min eibadih fi alrzq, wywseh ealaa akhryn, lah alhikmat albalighat fi dhlk, wa'iilayh wahdah turjaeun baed almwt, fyjazykm ealaa aemalkm
